summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Allo PC Dépannage showcase website after FAQ removal and dark theme updates. All requested features verified working correctly.
passed_tests: Homepage loads correctly with all sections: Hero, Services, TeleAssistance, Advantages, Zones, Testimonials, CTA
FAQ section is NOT present on homepage (verified removed)
FAQ section is NOT present on location pages (verified on Paris 16 and Paris 17)
Zones section does NOT contain a world map (only location cards)
TeleAssistance section step 3 correctly says 'Acceptez et autorisez la connexion'
Contact page has dark theme (bg-tech-dark class present)
Contact form all fields present and functional
WhatsApp link present on Contact page
Contact form submission works via POST /api/contact - success message displayed
Navigation has proper alignment with all links: Accueil, Services, Assistance informatique, Contact
Localités dropdown shows all 5 locations (Paris 16, Paris 17, Paris 8, Neuilly, Levallois)
Location pages load correctly (tested Paris 16 and Paris 17)
Backend locations API returns all 5 locations with correct data
Backend services API returns service list
Backend contact form validation working (rejects missing required fields)
seed_data_creation: Test contact form submissions created with TEST_ prefix
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features from the requirements verified. FAQ section successfully removed from Home.js and LocationPage.js. Contact page has dark theme. TeleAssistance step 3 text updated. Zones section shows location cards without world map. Navigation dropdown working with all 5 locations.

mocked_apis.POST /api/contact: Data is saved to MongoDB but noted as 'prints to console only' per original spec - actually saves to DB
